ygData.subject: Re: My last post till tuesday
ygData.msgSnippet: Plintissa thought about it. And realized how much of a softy she was. She put away her gun for fear of Iron Raptor looking down upon her and not up. Plintissa

Plintissa thought about it. And realized how much of a softy she was. She
put away her gun for fear of Iron Raptor looking down upon her and not up.
Plintissa walked back into the Maximal base, shrugging to the others.
Dracona sighs. Sinesis looks furious and walks away with Sinister. The
Radicons all groan. Plintissa runs up to Iron Raptor.

"Iron Raptor, I shall no longer support the Maximals, I am sorry. I believe
my team could take your team out, thanks to the Radicons. I was going to
attack the Maximal base, but I didn't, because of you." Plintissa said.
Plintissa stred into Iron Raptor's eyes. Plintissa smiled at her to show
that they were still friends and that Plintissa had no hard feelings.
Dracona waited outside. Dracona walked into a meadow, but the whole air
stunck of cigar smoke. Dracona did a fake laugh as she looked at Stronghold
and Scamrock.

"Where did you get those?" Dracona asked.

"From our ship." Was the simple reply from Stronghold. Dracona didn't say
anything else...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 11:39 AM
Subject: Re: My last post till tuesday


>
>
> * Iron Raptor hears Plintissa's transmission but ignores it, it was
nothing new to her and frankly she didn't give a nano any longer.
> Plintissa chose her path and it had seemed to lead her into the wrong
direction, but her own fate was in her own hands.*
>
>
